page.title: 03Work Amberley/ Rackham
page.content: Included in this group,electricians, plumbers, builders, and decoraters. The older men are fully qualified in their trades some being self employed whilst the younger ones are serving apprenticeships. One family runs the local public house and another a retail buisiness in Worthing.Some housewives help in the homes of the other village residents. A local mushroom factoryprovides both part and fulltime employment for women residents, as does a Pulborough garden centre.A few semi-retired men help other residents with their gardens and the farmers on their land. There are only a few working professionals who commute daily, a solicitor, 2 hospital secretaries, 2 laboratory technicians, and 2 company executives.
